title: Tika Parser Configuration
description: Configuration options for the Tika document parser

maxContentLength.description: Maximum length of content to extract (in characters). Use -1 for no limit.

extractMetadata.description: Whether to extract and include metadata from the document

tikaConfigPath.description: Path to a custom Tika configuration XML file. If not provided, default Tika configuration will be used.

log_prefix.description: Prefix to add to log messages
